name: Giant Moto Free
description:
Giant Moto is a high speed, high flying racing game that's all about the jumps, turbo boosts and scoring the best time. Giant Moto features beautiful retina display graphics, iPhone 5 widescreen support, 10 challenging tracks and 4 motorcycle's to choose from. You can race against yourself or against 3 computer controlled bikes with 3 difficulty levels so it's challenging and fun for kids of all ages.

"Giant Moto Free" is the advertising-supported version of Giant Moto. If you want the ad-free version, look for Giant Moto on the app store.

Accolades:
★ Previously an iTunes Hot New Game/Racing Game!
★ Previously an iTunes "Best Racing Game"!
★ Previously an iTunes "What's Hot" Game!
★ Previously an iTunes "New & Noteworthy" Game!

Reviews:
★ "Games of the Week: ...this is a perfect little motocross game. Giant Moto is all about jumps, turbo boosts, and scoring the best time. It's reminiscent of the Nintendo classic ExciteBike--but a lot purtier, to be sure. Well worth 99 cents."

★ AppModo: "Giant Moto takes iPhone motocross racing to the next level with it’s highly detailed 3D graphics, physics engine, and killer racing system!"

★ allaboutthegames.co.uk: "Though there are a million and one tedious physics-based bike 'em ups, there's never really been anything as smooth and slick as Giant Moto."

★ TouchArcade: "I can't wait to get my hands on this game, as I've been waiting for a truly excellent Excitebike-like game for the iPhone."

★ 148apps: "Giant Moto is a fun, faithful homage to the video game classic Excitebike, providing players with an improved, updated pick-up-and-play arcade racer that stays true to the original."

★ Patrick, age 8: "I love these jumps!!!"
